30070000.Original_Text: 매화단의 탐사는 방방곡곡\n가지 않는 곳이 없지!
30070000.English_Text: There is no place that the plum blossoms don't go to!

30070001.Original_Text: 이런 위기라니!\n얼마나 대단한 발견을 하려는 걸까?
30070001.English_Text: What a crisis!\nHow great are you trying to make a discovery?
30070001.Chinese_Text: 真是一场危机！\n你想做出多大的发现？

30070002.English_Text: According to the results of this investigation...

30070003.English_Text: If you did! It would be great!
30070003.Chinese_Text: 如果你这样做了！那就太好了！

30070004.English_Text: Is the Sohyup going to be okay...

30070007.Original_Text: 이 낡은 도끼라도 연못에 던지면\n새 도끼가 될까?
30070007.English_Text: If I throw this old ax into a pond, will it become a new axe?
30070007.Chinese_Text: 如果我把这把旧斧子扔进池塘里，它会变成一把新斧子吗？

30070008.Original_Text: 내 이 녀석을 가만두지 않을 거야!
30070008.English_Text: I won't leave this guy alone!

30070010.Original_Text: 설마 어둑시니는 누군가의\n필요로 생겼을 뿐인 마물?
30070010.English_Text: Are you supposed to be a dimly lit monster that only looks like someone’s need?
30070010.Chinese_Text: 你是不是应该是一个只看别人需要的，昏暗的怪物？

30070011.Original_Text: 결코 경거망동하지 않는 것.\n그것이 요리사의 품격.
30070011.English_Text: Never be arrogant.\nThat's the dignity of a chef.
30070011.Chinese_Text: 永远不要傲慢。\n这是厨师的尊严。

30070012.Original_Text: 그런데 왜 번개 자국이\n검은새벽단 근처에 있을까?
30070012.English_Text: But why are there lightning marks near the \nBlackdawn?
30070012.Chinese_Text: 但为什么\nBlackdawn 附近会有闪电痕迹？

30070013.English_Text: So it must be a blatant lie!
30070013.Chinese_Text: 所以一定是赤裸裸的谎言！

30070014.Original_Text: 엉엉, 이대로 죽는 줄 알았어요.\n너무 무서웠어요!
30070014.English_Text: Ugh, I thought I was going to die like this. I was so scared!
30070014.Chinese_Text: 呃，我还以为我要这样死了，吓死我了！

30070016.English_Text: Jang Moon-nim is important too, but I'm also...
30070016.Chinese_Text: 张文宁也很重要，但我也……

30070017.English_Text: I'm too weak compared to my brother!
30070017.Chinese_Text: 比起哥哥，我实在是太弱了！

30070018.English_Text: Heh, heh heh... it was dangerous.

30070019.English_Text: Because this body has reached the ultimate in training!
30070019.Chinese_Text: 因为这具身体，已经修炼到了极致！

30070020.Original_Text: 자, 힘차게. 하나, 둘! 하나, 둘!
30070020.English_Text: Come on, vigorously. One, two! One, two!

30070021.English_Text: Is this really the ultimate training method...?
30070021.Chinese_Text: 这真的是终极修炼方法吗……？
